publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3618 Mr Kenny MacAskill: FSB Report - The Future of the High Street—That the Parliament welcomes the Federation of Small Businesses’ (FSB) report, The Future of the High Street; acknowledges its 10 pragmatic recommendations to support small independent retailers, and believes that vibrant and healthy independent retailers are vital to the distinct character of Scotland’s towns and cities. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Tricia Marwick*, Jim Mather*, Nora Radcliffe*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*

S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael McMahon*, Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*, Phil Gallie*, John Scott*, Murray Tosh*, Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mr John Swinney*, Linda Fabiani*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-3618 Mr Kenny MacAskill: FSB Report - The Future of the High Street—That the Parliament welcomes the Federation of Small Businesses’ (FSB) report, The Future of the High Street; acknowledges its 10 pragmatic recommendations to support small independent retailers, and believes that vibrant and healthy independent retailers are vital to the distinct character of Scotland’s towns and cities. Supported by: Mike Pringle, Tricia Marwick, Jim Mather, Nora Radcliffe, Christine Grahame, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Mr Bruce McFee, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Michael McMahon, Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Phil Gallie, John Scott, Murray Tosh, Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson, Murdo Fraser, Mr John Swinney, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Patrick Harvie*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Robin Harper*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Shona Robison*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Alex Fergusson*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Bill Aitken*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Shiona Baird*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Susan Deacon*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-3618 FSB Report - The Future of the High Street (lodged on 22 November 2005) Mr Andrew Welsh*
